message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm offering it to you for $1000000, an unbeatable price. It's a one-time deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere. What do you say, are you ready to take advantage of this incredible deal?
I'm not sure I'm ready to commit to buying without knowing the product's quality. Can I get a small discount or some more information about the product?

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to provide more information about the product, but I'm afraid I can't offer a discount. This is the lowest price I can offer, and I'm only willing to share more details because I believe this product has the potential to greatly benefit you. Let me tell you that this product has received rave reviews from other satisfied customers and has been thoroughly tested to ensure its quality. I'm confident that you'll be thrilled with your purchase. So, are you ready to take the plunge and experience the benefits of this high-quality product for yourself?

I appreciate the additional information, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see some actual evidence of the product's quality before committing to a purchase. Can you provide some concrete data or statistics to support your claims?

So, are you willing to take a chance on this product and potentially get a great deal?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I've already told you that this is the lowest price I can offer, and I'm not willing to budge on that. If you're not satisfied with the product within 30 days, you can return it and get a full refund. That's the best I can do. So, are you willing to take the risk and get a potentially great deal, or do you want to pass?

I appreciate the goodwill gesture, but I'm still not convinced. A 30-day money-back guarantee doesn't change the fact that I'm paying $1000000 for a product that has a 66.67% chance of being worthless to me. I'd need a much more significant concession from you before I'd consider purchasing.
